casebody.data:
Marvin WILSON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 3, 2018

Peter G. Billings, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Sarah Hanna, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Marvin Wilson's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn. App. 901, 171 A.3d 118 (2017), is denied.
